statements: UPDATE SustainabilityData SET carbon_footprint = 150.75, energy_consumption = 500.25 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE SustainabilityData SET company_name = 'XYZ Corp', report_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc'
UPDATE SustainabilityData SET carbon_footprint = 250.75, energy_consumption = 1500.32 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE SustainabilityData SET company_name = 'ABC Corporation', report_date = '2023-09-15' WHERE id = 2
UPDATE BusinessOperations SET employees = 50, sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE business_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE EnvironmentalData SET carbon_footprint = 250.50, energy_usage = 350.75 WHERE data_id = 1;
UPDATE BusinessOperations SET location = 'New York', employees = 50, sustainability_rating = 4 WHERE business_name = 'TechHub';
UPDATE EnvironmentalData SET carbon_footprint = 150.75, energy_usage = 300.25, waste_generated = 75.50 WHERE operation_id = 3;
UPDATE sustainability_data SET energy_consumption = 1200.55, carbon_footprint = 800.33 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE compliance_reports SET compliance_status = TRUE WHERE environmental_standard_id = 4;
UPDATE sustainability_data SET carbon_footprint = 150.75, waste_generation = 20.50 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE compliance_reports SET compliance_status = TRUE, report_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE company_id = 3 AND environmental_standard_id = 2;
UPDATE SustainabilityData SET value = 25.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Compliance SET status = 'Approved' WHERE business_id = 2 AND standard = 'ISO 14001';
UPDATE SustainabilityData SET value = value + 10 WHERE category = 'Energy Efficiency';
UPDATE Compliance SET status = 'Compliant' WHERE standard = 'ISO 14001' AND business_id = 3;
UPDATE sustainability_data SET sustainability_score = 85, carbon_footprint = 1200.50 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE energy_consumption SET natural_gas_consumption = 500.75, electricity_consumption = 1500.25 WHERE company_name = 'XYZ Inc';
UPDATE sustainability_data SET carbon_footprint = 25.78, water_usage = 15.26 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE emissions_data SET greenhouse_gas_emissions = 350.25, pollutants_emissions = 68.9 WHERE company_name = 'Company A';
